And
Besides, tuus A
pollo is spoke in relation to Lato
na, Sister to A
pollo.
V. Epit. ad Li
vium c. 134. V. Petav. Pacatum{que} reget patriis virtutibus Orbem, could not be meant of Augustus, who assumed not that name till the Battel of Actium was over, which was about the Year of Rome 718, five Years after Pollio's Consulship, when this Poem was wrote.
